description: Onigawara Mao`s support mechanism. In case of an emergency, protect yourself and protect Mao. At the time of development, it was named " White Tiger ". Although he does not speak words, he can communicate with Mao and Tokusaburo. In the comic version, it was equipped with a wave cannon with powerful destructive power for a while, but it was shocked by the shock that Mao hated.
name: Mii-kun
